Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.DevelopmentCards

Class CardsMarket

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.DevelopmentCards.CardsMarket
public class CardsMarket
extends java.lang.Object
this class represent the market of cards

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    CardsMarket()
    this method create the market

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean checkCard​(int level, CardColor color)
    this method check if a deck of card is empty
    boolean checkMissColumn()
    this method verify if all the cards of one color are not available anymore, in particular if a column of the market is empty
    DevelopmentCard getCard​(int level, CardColor color)
    this method get the card with the color and level specified by the parameters, it returns null if the deck of cards is empty or if the parameters aren't correct
    java.util.List<DevelopmentCard>[][] getCardMatrix()
    this method get the matrix of decks
    DevelopmentCard popCard​(int level, CardColor color)
    this method get and remove the card specified by the parameters, it requires that the deck of cards isn't empty and the inputs are correct
    DevelopmentCard[][] show()
    this method get the visible state of the market in particular, it get the highest card of the market with a get and adds it to a matrix

  • Constructor Details

    • CardsMarket

      public CardsMarket()
      this method create the market

  • Method Details

    • popCard

      public DevelopmentCard popCard​(int level, CardColor color)
      this method get and remove the card specified by the parameters, it requires that the deck of cards isn't empty and the inputs are correct
      Parameters:
      level - this is the level of the card, it should be a number between 1 and 3
      color - this is the color of the card, it shouldn't be null
      Returns:
      the card with the level and color specified

    • checkMissColumn

      public boolean checkMissColumn()
      this method verify if all the cards of one color are not available anymore, in particular if a column of the market is empty
      Returns:
      true if a column is empty, false if it isn't

    • getCard

      public DevelopmentCard getCard​(int level, CardColor color)
      this method get the card with the color and level specified by the parameters, it returns null if the deck of cards is empty or if the parameters aren't correct
      Parameters:
      level - this is the level of the card, it should be between 1 and 3
      color - this is the color of the card, it shouldn't be null
      Returns:
      the card with the level and color specified, null if the inputs aren't correct or if the deck selected is empty

    • checkCard

      public boolean checkCard​(int level, CardColor color)
      this method check if a deck of card is empty
      Parameters:
      level - this is the level of the card to check, it should be between 1 and 3
      color - this is the color of the card to check, it shouldn't be null
      Returns:
      true if there is a card in the deck with the level and color specified in the parameters in the market, false if not or if the inputs aren't correct

    • getCardMatrix

      public java.util.List<DevelopmentCard>[][] getCardMatrix()
      this method get the matrix of decks
      Returns:
      the matrix of decks

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object

    • show

      public DevelopmentCard[][] show()
      this method get the visible state of the market in particular, it get the highest card of the market with a get and adds it to a matrix
      Returns:
      a matrix with all the highest cards of the market
